entry.title: Battery Compatible For Moto G4 Plus GA40
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 10.99

You have a Moto G4 Plus that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Moto G4 Plus shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Moto G4 Plus replacement battery.

The battery in your phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

Our batteries are produced with the same quality standard as original Moto G4 Plus batteries. The Moto G4 Plus replacement battery power is rated at 2800 mAh. After this easy battery repair, your phone will have the same battery health as when your Moto G4 Plus was new.

  • Zero cycle count
  • UN38.3, MSDS, ROHS, CE Certification
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • Less than 20 minutes to replace
  • 1-Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Moto G4 Plus.

Warranty

The Replacement Moto G4 Plus Battery comes with 1 year warranty, as our other Motorola Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Moto G4 Plus Battery
Compatible Model Moto G4 Plus (XT1641, XT1642, XT1643, XT1644, XT1625)
Model Number XT1607
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
